title: HELP MEEEE
body: Today, I logged into LoL and played a game, then, I was disconnected! Later on, it said that some people might get disconnected, and I found out that that 'some people' was me! So I tried to log on, and it doesn't work... It says '(attempt 1)', and I can't do anything... I just waited and waited, and it finally said 'Logging on...' but it just says that and nothing happens.... WHAT IS HAPPENING??? SOMEONE HELP MAHHH

replies.body: addendum..Due to the server instability, your match may or may not have been recorded. It's advised to wait until the instability has been resolved to find out as your match may have been recorded but delayed due to the instability.
Hey bro, appreciate your help but ensure to read the thread starter's post firstly. You're free to use my replies but to avoid inaccurate replies. :D

> [{quoted}](name=Rineyy,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=GTqLxEW0,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-09-18T06:03:58.971+0000)
>
> Hey bro, appreciate your help but ensure to read the thread starter's post firstly. You're free to use my replies but to avoid inaccurate replies. :D

You are very right, thank you!
There were some server issues but all is well now.  Stay updated on any issues through our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  Let me know if you still have any issues.
LoL NA is currently experiencing technical difficulties. Riot is aware and working to resolve them. Apologies for the inconvenience.
